channel.title: Runserver.bat error please help
channel.description:
I cant run the server..I get this error.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...[/code]
And this is the code in runserver.bat
[code]@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
Help pl0x?
EDIT: btw its not the wrong path,i have jdk1.6.0_13[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 11:39:49 am[/size][hr]OMFG PLEASE HELP
Whoever gives me a working code I will pm you Winterloves source,which is a bit rare.

item.title: Runserver.bat error please help
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

or just simply change the 13 to something between 5 and 16 except 13 thats what i do but i fixed it now i can log in

item.title: Runserver.bat error please help

item.description:
@noobsauce wrote:

I cant run the server…I get this error.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...

And this is the code in runserver.bat

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Help pl0x?

btw its not the wrong path,i have jdk1.6.0_13[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 11:39:49 am[/size][hr]OMFG PLEASE HELP
